meanings.definition: Not chosen for a position through an election.
meanings.sent1: The committee consisted of both elected and nonelected members.
meanings.sent2: The nonelected officials played a crucial role in the decision-making process.
meanings.sent3: The nonelected team member surprised everyone with their innovative ideas.
meanings.sent4: Her nonelected status gave her a unique perspective on the issue.
meanings.sent5: The nonelected volunteers worked tirelessly to support the community.

meanings.definition: Not appointed or selected through a voting process.
meanings.sent1: The nonelected board members brought diverse perspectives to the table.
meanings.sent2: The nonelected candidates had to work harder to gain recognition.
meanings.sent3: The nonelected position allowed for more flexibility in decision-making.
meanings.sent4: His nonelected status gave him the freedom to pursue other interests.
meanings.sent5: The nonelected officials were respected for their dedication to public service.
